sqlMap.select:
SELECT a.DATABASE_TY_ID, d.DATABASE_TY_NM, a.IDX_ID, c.IDX_NM, a.IDX_LEVEL, a.IDX_WGHTVAL , CASE WHEN e.IDX_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END EMPHS_IDX_ID , s.CODE, s.CODE_NM, s.MUMM, s.MXMM,
s.RESULT_DC RESULT_DCSTR, s.EMPHS_IDX_RESULT_DC EMPHS_IDX_RESULT_DCSTR,
CASE WHEN s.RESULT_DC IS NULL OR trim(s.RESULT_DC)='' THEN (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID='T60' AND CODE='R10' ) ELSE (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID='T60' AND CODE='R20' ) END RESULT_DC , CASE WHEN s.EMPHS_IDX_RESULT_DC IS NULL OR trim(s.EMPHS_IDX_RESULT_DC)='' THEN (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID='T60' AND CODE='R10' ) ELSE (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID='T60' AND CODE='R20' ) END EMPHS_IDX_RESULT_DC , s.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, s.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM TNDATABASETYIDXWGHTVAL a LEFT OUTER JOIN TNIDXINFO c ON ( a.IDX_ID=c.IDX_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TNDATABASETYMANAGE d ON ( a.DATABASE_TY_ID=d.DATABASE_TY_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TNEMPHSIDXMANAGE e ON ( a.DATABASE_TY_ID=e.DATABASE_TY_ID AND a.IDX_ID=e.IDX_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT c.CODE_ID, c.CODE, c.CODE_NM , a.DATABASE_TY_ID, a.IDX_ID, a.IDX_LEVEL, a.MUMM, a.MXMM, a.RESULT_DC, a.EMPHS_IDX_RESULT_DC, a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, a.FRST_REGISTER_ID, a.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE c LEFT OUTER JOIN TNIDXSCOREMANAGE a ON ( c.CODE_ID=a.CODE_ID AND c.CODE=a.CODE AND a.IDX_LEVEL=1 ) WHERE c.CODE_ID = 'IDX100'
) s ON ( a.DATABASE_TY_ID=s.DATABASE_TY_ID AND a.IDX_ID=s.IDX_ID
S.CODE=#CODE#
) WHERE a.UPPER_IDX_ID IS NOT NULL
A.DATABASE_TY_ID=#DATABASETYID#
A.IDX_ID=#IDXID#
AND a.IDX_LEVEL=1
START WITH a.IDX_ID = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR a.IDX_ID = a.UPPER_IDX_ID
ORDER siblings BY d.SORT_ORDR, a.SORT_ORDR, s.MUMM desc

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (
SELECT a.DATABASE_TY_ID, d.DATABASE_TY_NM, a.IDX_ID, c.IDX_NM, a.IDX_LEVEL, a.IDX_WGHTVAL , CASE WHEN e.IDX_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END EMPHS_IDX_ID , s.CODE, s.CODE_NM, s.MUMM, s.MXMM, s.RESULT_DC RESULT_DCSTR, s.EMPHS_IDX_RESULT_DC EMPHS_IDX_RESULT_DCSTR,
CASE WHEN s.RESULT_DC IS NULL OR trim(s.RESULT_DC)='' THEN (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID='T60' AND CODE='R10' ) ELSE (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID='T60' AND CODE='R20' ) END RESULT_DC , CASE WHEN s.EMPHS_IDX_RESULT_DC IS NULL OR trim(s.EMPHS_IDX_RESULT_DC)='' THEN (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID='T60' AND CODE='R10' ) ELSE (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID='T60' AND CODE='R20' ) END EMPHS_IDX_RESULT_DC , s.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, s.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM TNDATABASETYIDXWGHTVAL a LEFT OUTER JOIN TNIDXINFO c ON ( a.IDX_ID=c.IDX_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TNDATABASETYMANAGE d ON ( a.DATABASE_TY_ID=d.DATABASE_TY_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TNEMPHSIDXMANAGE e ON ( a.DATABASE_TY_ID=e.DATABASE_TY_ID AND a.IDX_ID=e.IDX_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT c.CODE_ID, c.CODE, c.CODE_NM , a.DATABASE_TY_ID, a.IDX_ID, a.IDX_LEVEL, a.MUMM, a.MXMM, a.RESULT_DC, a.EMPHS_IDX_RESULT_DC, a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, a.FRST_REGISTER_ID, a.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE c LEFT OUTER JOIN TNIDXSCOREMANAGE a ON ( c.CODE_ID=a.CODE_ID AND c.CODE=a.CODE AND a.IDX_LEVEL=1 ) WHERE c.CODE_ID = 'IDX100'
) s ON ( a.DATABASE_TY_ID=s.DATABASE_TY_ID AND a.IDX_ID=s.IDX_ID
S.CODE=#CODE#
) WHERE a.UPPER_IDX_ID IS NOT NULL
A.DATABASE_TY_ID=#DATABASETYID#
A.IDX_ID=#IDXID#
AND a.IDX_LEVEL=1
START WITH a.IDX_ID = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR a.IDX_ID = a.UPPER_IDX_ID
ORDER siblings BY d.SORT_ORDR, a.SORT_ORDR, s.MUMM desc )
SELECT DATABASE_TY_ID ,DATABASE_TY_NM FROM TNDATABASETYMANAGE WHERE USE_AT='Y'

SELECT b.CODE AS CODE, b.CODE_NM AS CODE_NM, b.CODE_ID AS CODE_ID FROM COMTCCMMNCODE a, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE b WHERE a.CODE_ID=b.CODE_ID AND a.CL_CODE='PQC' AND a.CODE_ID='IDX100' AND a.USE_AT='Y' AND b.USE_AT='Y'
SELECT IDX_NM, IDX_ID FROM TNIDXINFO WHERE USE_AT='Y' AND IDX_STTUS_CODE='U' AND IDX_LEVEL=1 START WITH IDX_ID = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR IDX_ID = UPPER_IDX_ID ORDER siblings BY SORT_ORDR
sqlMap.delete: DELETE TNIDXSCOREMANAGE FROM WHERE DATABASE_TY_ID=#HDATABASETYID# AND CODE_ID='IDX100' AND CODE=#HCODE# AND IDX_ID=#HIDXID#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT a.DATABASE_TY_ID, d.DATABASE_TY_NM, a.IDX_ID, c.IDX_NM, a.IDX_LEVEL, a.IDX_WGHTVAL , CASE WHEN e.IDX_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END EMPHS_IDX_ID , s.CODE, s.CODE_NM, s.MUMM, s.MXMM, s.RESULT_DC RESULT_DCSTR, s.EMPHS_IDX_RESULT_DC EMPHS_IDX_RESULT_DCSTR, CASE WHEN s.RESULT_DC IS NULL OR trim(s.RESULT_DC)='' THEN (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID='T60' AND CODE='R10' ) ELSE (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID='T60' AND CODE='R20' ) END RESULT_DC , CASE WHEN s.EMPHS_IDX_RESULT_DC IS NULL OR trim(s.EMPHS_IDX_RESULT_DC)='' THEN (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID='T60' AND CODE='R10' ) ELSE (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID='T60' AND CODE='R20' ) END EMPHS_IDX_RESULT_DC , s.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, s.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM TNDATABASETYIDXWGHTVAL a LEFT OUTER JOIN TNIDXINFO c ON ( a.IDX_ID=c.IDX_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TNDATABASETYMANAGE d ON ( a.DATABASE_TY_ID=d.DATABASE_TY_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TNEMPHSIDXMANAGE e ON ( a.DATABASE_TY_ID=e.DATABASE_TY_ID AND a.IDX_ID=e.IDX_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT c.CODE_ID, c.CODE, c.CODE_NM , a.DATABASE_TY_ID, a.IDX_ID, a.IDX_LEVEL, a.MUMM, a.MXMM, a.RESULT_DC, a.EMPHS_IDX_RESULT_DC, a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, a.FRST_REGISTER_ID, a.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE c LEFT OUTER JOIN TNIDXSCOREMANAGE a ON ( c.CODE_ID=a.CODE_ID AND c.CODE=a.CODE AND a.IDX_LEVEL=1 ) WHERE c.CODE_ID = 'IDX100' ) s ON ( a.DATABASE_TY_ID=s.DATABASE_TY_ID AND a.IDX_ID=s.IDX_ID ) WHERE a.UPPER_IDX_ID IS NOT NULL
AND A.DATABASE_TY_ID=#DATABASETYID# AND s.code_nm=#CODENM# AND a.IDX_ID=#IDXID#
AND a.IDX_LEVEL=1 START WITH a.IDX_ID = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR a.IDX_ID = a.UPPER_IDX_ID ORDER siblings BY d.SORT_ORDR, a.SORT_ORDR, s.MUMM desc
